content: this is an easy crochet pattern for a chibi-esque doll base a customizable doll base you can use to create your favourite tv-show video game or d&d characters --- to complete this pattern you will need these materials - 4 0mm/g-6 crochet hook - 14mm safety eyes - tapestry needle - scissors - stitch marker - polyester fiber - colour of your choice 60 gms to complete this pattern you will need to know these stitches - round - chain - single_crochet - slip_stitch - increase - decrease - back loop only --- you may not sell distribute or claim this pattern as your own you may sell the finished product made from this pattern
